  <description xmlns:lom="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://fire.eun.org/xsd/lre/lre.xsd">
        <general>
          <identifier xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:REPOSITORIOMEPT:1639</entry>

          </identifier>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <language>pt</language>
          <title>
            <string language="pt">O Olhar na Educação Visual</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="pt">Actividade mista para os alunos que frequentam a disciplina de Educação Visual do 3º ciclo do Ensino Básico. Após uma fase de pesquisa, os alunos são convidados a realizar dois exercícios num programa de edição de imagem.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="pt">Olhar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="pt">Educação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="pt">Visual</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="pt">Forma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="pt">Fundo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:REPOSITORIOMEPT:1639</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>REPOSITORIOMEPT</catalog>
            <entry>1639</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>pt</language>
          <contribute>
            <date>
              <dateTime>2009-05-26</dateTime>
            </date>
            <role>
              <source>LOMv1.0</source>
              <value>creator</value>

        </metaMetadata>
        <lifeCycle>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:João Carlos Faria Nunes;João Carlos Faria Nunes;;;

ORG:Escola Secundária Sebastião da Gama;;

            <date>

        <educational>

            <value>mixed</value>
          </interactivityType>
          <interactivityLevel>
            <source>interactivityLevelValues</source>

          </interactivityLevel>
          <semanticDensity>
            <source>semanticDensityValues</source>

          <difficulty>
